BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses
Comment: Continuation of the October 9, 2007 Recessed Meeting

Items.Title: Application no. 20085025 SCX, a site selection of Block 2692, Lot 14, former P.S. 99  for redevelopment as a  640-seat high school,  Council District no. 17, Borough of the Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. 20085025 SCX, a site selection of Block 2692, Lot 14, former P.S. 99  for redevelopment as a  640-seat high school,  Council District no. 17, Borough of the Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
